text: Plesiastraea is a genus of corals. It is the only genus in the monotypic family Plesiastreidae. ==Species== The following species are recognized in the genus Plesiastraea: * †Plesiastrea costata (Duncan, 1880) * †Plesiastrea decipiens (Duncan, 1880) * †Plesiastrea pedunculata (Duncan, 1880) * Plesiastrea versipora (Lamarck, 1816) ==References== Category:Scleractinia genera Category:Scleractinia
title: Plesiastrea
